languages.text: "Соглашусь, что от тассерция надо избавиться, но я не стану сообщать Администратуму о его свойствах. Планету могут уничтожить — нельзя, чтобы из-за проступков Руолдо пострадали невинные люди".

traits.locale_text: "Это сотни миров под угрозой. Поставки должны быть прекращены, а тассерций — запрещен в Секторе Каликсис".

languages.text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."
languages.original_text: "Соглашусь, что от тассерция надо избавиться, но я не стану сообщать Администратуму о его свойствах. Планету могут уничтожить — нельзя, чтобы из-за проступков Руолдо пострадали невинные люди".

"I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

languages.text: “塔瑟拉水晶必须彻底销毁，这点我同意，但我不打算将这种物质的特性告知内政部。因为如果我真的这么做，这颗行星可能会毁于一旦。我不能让无辜的人因为罗尔多的恶行而遭到惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: “塔瑟拉水晶必须彻底销毁，这点我同意，但我不打算将这种物质的特性告知内政部。因为如果我真的这么做，这颗行星可能会毁于一旦。我不能让无辜的人因为罗尔多的恶行而遭到惩罚。”

languages.text: 「タッセリウムを処分しなければならないことには賛成だが、その特性を帝国行政局に知らせるつもりはない。そんなことをすれば惑星の破壊を招くかもしれない。ルオルドの過ちのせいで無実の者たちを苦しませることはできない」
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセリウムを処分しなければならないことには賛成だが、その特性を帝国行政局に知らせるつもりはない。そんなことをすれば惑星の破壊を招くかもしれない。ルオルドの過ちのせいで無実の者たちを苦しませることはできない」

languages.text: «Coincido en que hemos de librarnos del thassertio, pero no revelaré sus propiedades al Administratum. Podría suponer la aniquilación de todo el planeta, y no quiero que los inocentes paguen por las fechorías de Ruoldo».
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: «Coincido en que hemos de librarnos del thassertio, pero no revelaré sus propiedades al Administratum. Podría suponer la aniquilación de todo el planeta, y no quiero que los inocentes paguen por las fechorías de Ruoldo».

languages.text: "Tasertiyumdan kurtulmamız gerektiğine katılıyorum ancak özelliklerini Administratum'a bildirmeyeceğim. Bu durum gezegenin yok olmasına neden olabilir. Ruoldo'nun suçları yüzünden masumların acı çekmesine izin veremeyiz."
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: "Tasertiyumdan kurtulmamız gerektiğine katılıyorum ancak özelliklerini Administratum'a bildirmeyeceğim. Bu durum gezegenin yok olmasına neden olabilir. Ruoldo'nun suçları yüzünden masumların acı çekmesine izin veremeyiz."

languages.text: « Je suis d'accord pour dire qu'il faut nous débarrasser du thassertium, mais je refuse d'alerter l'Administratum quant à ses propriétés. La planète risquerait de s'en trouver détruite, et il est hors de question que des innocents souffrent par la faute de Ruoldo. »
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis d'accord pour dire qu'il faut nous débarrasser du thassertium, mais je refuse d'alerter l'Administratum quant à ses propriétés. La planète risquerait de s'en trouver détruite, et il est hors de question que des innocents souffrent par la faute de Ruoldo. »

languages.text: "Ich stimme zu, dass wir das Thassertium loswerden müssen, aber ich werde das Administratum nicht über seine Eigenschaften informieren. Das könnte zur Zerstörung des Planeten führen, und wir können nicht nur wegen Ruoldos Missetaten Unschuldige leiden lassen."
languages.original_text: "I agree that we must get rid of the thassertium, but I will not inform the Administratum of its properties. It may result in the planet's destruction, and we cannot have innocents suffer because of Ruoldo's misdeeds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stimme zu, dass wir das Thassertium loswerden müssen, aber ich werde das Administratum nicht über seine Eigenschaften informieren. Das könnte zur Zerstörung des Planeten führen, und wir können nicht nur wegen Ruoldos Missetaten Unschuldige leiden lassen."
